00025 #include "rigidbodymasspoint.h"
00026 #include "simulation.h"
00027 
00028 namespace mknix {
00029 
00030 RigidBodyMassPoint::RigidBodyMassPoint() : RigidBody()
00031 {
00032 }
00033 
00034 RigidBodyMassPoint::RigidBodyMassPoint( std::string title_in,
00035                                                   Node * nodeA_in,
00036                                                   double mass_in
00037                                                )
00038      : RigidBody( title_in ),
00039        mass( mass_in )
00040 {
00041   nodes.push_back( nodeA_in );
00042   this->massMatrix.resize( 1*dim, 1*dim );
00043   this->externalForces.resize( 1*dim );
00044 }
00045 
00046 RigidBodyMassPoint::~RigidBodyMassPoint()
00047 {
00048 }
00049 
00050 void RigidBodyMassPoint::calcMassMatrix()
00051 {
00052   /* For Problem in 2D
00053    * MassMatrix = | m 0 |
00054    *              | 0 m |
00055    */
00056   this->massMatrix(0,0) = mass ;
00057   this->massMatrix(1,1) = mass ;
00058   
00059   /* For Problem in 3D
00060    * MassMatrix = | m 0 0 |
00061    *              | 0 m 0 |
00062    *              | 0 0 m |
00063    */
00064   if ( dim == 3 )
00065   {
00066      this->massMatrix(2,2) = mass ;
00067   }
00068 }
00069 
00070 void RigidBodyMassPoint::calcExternalForces()
00071 {
00072   /*For Problem in 2D*/
00073   this->externalForces(0) = -mass * Simulation::getGravity(0);
00074   this->externalForces(1) = -mass * Simulation::getGravity(1);
00075   
00076   if ( dim == 3 )
00077   {
00078      this->externalForces(2) = -mass * Simulation::getGravity(2);
00079   }
00080 }
00081 
00082 Node * RigidBodyMassPoint::getNode( std::string name_in )
00083 {
00084   if( name_in == "NODEA" )
00085   {
00086      return this->nodes[0];
00087   }
00088   if( name_in == "NODEB" )
00089   {
00090      return this->nodes[0];
00091   }
00092   else
00093   {
00094      cout << "ERROR: NO NODE WITH THAT NAME IN BAR" << endl;
00095   }
00096 }
00097 
00098 }
